name: Old Fashioned
ingredients:
2 oz bourbon or rye whiskey
2 dashes Angostura bitters
1 sugar cube or 1 tsp sugar
Orange twist garnish

name: Margarita
ingredients:
2 oz silver tequila
1 oz Cointreau 
1 oz lime juice
Salt for the rim

name: Cosmopolitan
ingredients:
1.5 oz citrus vodka
1 oz Cointreau 
.5 oz lime juice
.25 oz cranberry juice

name: Negroni
ingredients:
1 oz gin
1 oz Campari
1 oz sweet vermouth

name: Moscow Mule
ingredients:
2 oz vodka 
4 to 6 oz ginger beer
.5 oz lime juice

name: Martini
ingredients:
3 oz gin or vodka
.5 oz dry vermouth
Lemon peel or olive

name: Mojito
ingredients:
3 mint leaves
2 oz white rum
.75 oz lime juice
.5 oz simple syrup

name: Whiskey Sour
ingredients:
2 oz whiskey
1 oz lemon juice
1 tsp sugar
1 egg white (optional)

name: French 75
ingredients:
2 oz gin
2 dashes simple syrup
.5 oz lemon juice
Champagne

name: Manhattan
ingredients:
2 oz rye whiskey
1 oz sweet vermouth
2 dashes Angostura bitters

name: Spritz
ingredients:
Equal parts Aperol
Equal parts Cinzano Prosecco
Splash of Soda

name: Gimlet
ingredients:
2 oz gin or vodka
.75 oz simple syrup
.75 oz lime juice

name: Sazerac
ingredients:
2 oz rye whiskey
.5 oz simple syrup
2 dashes Peychaud's bitters
Absinthe

name: Pimm's Cup
ingredients:
50 ml (about 1.75 oz) Pimm's No.1
150 ml (about 5 oz) lemonade
Mint, orange, strawberries
Cucumber to garnish

name: Vesper
ingredients:
3 oz gin
1 oz vodka
.5 oz Lillet blanc

name: Mimosa
ingredients:
2.5 oz champagne
2.5 oz orange juice

name: Tom Collins
ingredients:
2 oz Old Tom gin
1 oz lemon juice
.5 oz simple syrup
Club soda to top

name: Paloma
ingredients:
2 oz tequila
.5 oz lime juice
Grapefruit soda to top

name: Sidecar
ingredients:
2 oz VS or VSOP Cognac
1 oz Cointreau
.75 oz lemon juice

name: Mint Julep
ingredients:
2 oz bourbon
8-10 mint leaves
.25 oz simple syrup

name: Daiquiri
ingredients:
2 oz light rum
1 oz simple syrup
1 oz lime juice

name: Dark & Stormy
ingredients:
1.5 oz Goslingâ€™s Black Seal Rum
Ginger beer to top

name: Martinez
ingredients:
1.5 oz Old Tom gin
1.5 oz sweet vermouth
.25 oz Luxardo maraschino liqueur
2 dashes Angostura or orange bitters
